attributes.action: Stop age discrimination and pay everybody fairly for doing the same jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: is it really fair that an 18 year old can get paid nearly double what someone a few months younger gets paid for doing exaclty the same job? no this is completely unreasonable and companies are getting away with exploiting young workers to the point of them working long hours for sometimes as little as £3.10 an hour. Students need to support themselves too and its about time we stood up to Age Discrimination among not just the old, but the younger members of our community aswell.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
